languages.text: "Вы не должны сражаться! Вокруг враги, хватит проливать кровь".
"You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."
languages.original_text: "Вы не должны сражаться! Вокруг враги, хватит проливать кровь".

traits.locale_text: "You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."
"You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."
"You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."
"You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."
"You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."
"You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."

languages.text: 「戦ってはならない！敵に囲まれている。血を流すのはもう十分だ」
languages.original_text: "You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."

traits.locale_text: 「戦ってはならない！敵に囲まれている。血を流すのはもう十分だ」

languages.text: “你们不能这么争斗！我们四面受敌，流的血已经够多了。”
languages.original_text: "You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."

traits.locale_text: “你们不能这么争斗！我们四面受敌，流的血已经够多了。”

languages.text: « Vous ne devez pas vous battre ! Nous sommes cernés par les ennemis. Le sang a suffisamment coulé. »
languages.original_text: "You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne devez pas vous battre ! Nous sommes cernés par les ennemis. Le sang a suffisamment coulé. »

languages.text: «¡No luchéis! Estamos rodeados de enemigos. Ya se ha derramado demasiada sangre».
languages.original_text: "You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."

traits.locale_text: «¡No luchéis! Estamos rodeados de enemigos. Ya se ha derramado demasiada sangre».

languages.text: "Ihr dürft nicht kämpfen! Wir sind von Feinden umzingelt. Es wurde schon genug Blut vergossen."
languages.original_text: "You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr dürft nicht kämpfen! Wir sind von Feinden umzingelt. Es wurde schon genug Blut vergossen."

languages.text: "Savaşmamalısınız! Etrafımız düşmanlarla çevrili. Yeterince kan döküldü."
languages.original_text: "You must not fight! We are surrounded by enemies. Enough blood has been shed."

traits.locale_text: "Savaşmamalısınız! Etrafımız düşmanlarla çevrili. Yeterince kan döküldü."
